name: Kamer Rose Jam
description: Rose petal jam is a sweet condiment made from rose petals - it is a magical delicacy with a delightful aroma and incredible taste. Serve rose jam on toast, a warm biscuit, or a scone. Rose jam can also be swirled into yogurt, and makes an elegant dessert when spooned over vanilla ice cream.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
